DOC.detailed_description: This randomize , crossover study . After obtain informed consent , healthy adult age 18-40 year child age 3-6 year randomize either consume almond almond paste first arm study second arm study . During intervention period , adult participant consume 1.5 ounce almond per day , child consume 0.5 ounce almond per day 3 week . After 4-week washout period , participant cross treatment ( almond consumption almond consumption ) . Participants complete daily questionnaire throughout intervention period , one week intervention period . Blood sample collect adult baseline final time point intervention . Stool sample collect pre-baseline final week intervention . Dietary intake assess weekly intervention period . Gastrointestinal symptoms questionnaire complete weekly intervention .
